definition: style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: You want the party to look similar - but not like members of a choir.
sentences.chinese: 你想讓婚宴有統一格調卻又不像唱詩班。

sentences.english: The hotel has been redecorated, but it lost a lot of it's style.
sentences.chinese: 旅館已重新裝修，但昔日優雅格調所剩不多。

sentences.english: Perfect scale, define your official elegance.
sentences.chinese: 完美尺度，定義貴仕優雅格調。

sentences.english: A compact sitting-room of the same genre was outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面是間具有同樣格調的小小的起居室。

sentences.english: The style of natural guileless, show a long time ago agrestic breath.
sentences.chinese: 自然樸實的格調，顯示出悠遠的鄉土氣息。

sentences.english: Chong Sheng Hall designs elegant and possesses Southern architectural features.
sentences.chinese: 崇聖堂設計格調高雅，具有南方建築特色。

sentences.english: Adjusted for inflation, that’s about what I still pay.
sentences.chinese: 膨脹的價格調整後，我還要付那麼多。

sentences.english: London Sophistication, Shanghai Style, Exclusively Created by Guoman.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦格調，上海風情，惟有國豐呈獻。

sentences.english: Auroral style is decorous, those who communicate is a kind of romantic feelings.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰色格調高雅，傳達的是一種浪漫情懷。

sentences.english: The restaurant decor will mimic that of the flagship shop in Taipei, mixing fashion with Chinese elements.
sentences.chinese: 餐廳格調會和臺北旗艦店幾本一致，混合中國風元素。

sentences.english: What the traditional lines concentrate on is the variedly artistic styles.
sentences.chinese: 一貫傳承的線條，傾注的是多元的藝術格調。

sentences.english: His artistic style is elegant and simple, full of poetic charm.
sentences.chinese: 他的藝術格調清麗簡約，雅俗之間，充滿詩情畫意。

sentences.english: Featuring high quality and exclusive Hollywood movies that suits the most discerning movie buffs.
sentences.chinese: 專爲愛好電影者而設，播放高格調的荷里活電影。

sentences.english: Price adaptations and programme-related assumptions contributed substantially.
sentences.chinese: 價格調整和與項目有關的假設起了很大作用。

sentences.english: But in Beijing today they were celebrating an opening, and doing so in some style.
sentences.chinese: 但是今天北京正在舉行一場頗有格調的開業大慶。

definition: implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
